name: Grounds for revocation of certificate of authority
text:
The department director may commence a proceeding under section 414D-284 to revoke the certificate of authority of a foreign corporation authorized to transact business in this State if:



	(1)	The corporation fails to:

		(A)	Pay any fees prescribed by law;
		(B)	File its annual report for a period of two years;
		(C)	Appoint and maintain an agent for service of process as required; or
		(D)	File a statement of a change in the name or business address of the agent as required; or

	(2)	A misrepresentation has been made of any material matter in any application, report, affidavit, or other record or document submitted by the corporation. [L 2001, c 105, pt of §1; am L 2002, c 130, §67; am L 2003, c 124, §39]
